name: CIFormat
desc: Pixel data formats for image input, output, and processing.

items.name: static var A16: CIFormat
items.desc: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.

items.name: static var A8: CIFormat
items.desc: An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.

items.name: static var ABGR8: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the alpha value precedes the blue, green, and red color components.

items.name: static var ARGB8: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the alpha value precedes the red, green, and blue color components.

items.name: static var Af: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, full-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.

items.name: static var Ah: CIFormat
items.desc: A 16-bit-per-pixel, half-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is alpha.

items.name: static var BGRA8: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the blue, green, and red color components precede the alpha value.

items.name: static var R16: CIFormat
items.desc: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.

items.name: static var R8: CIFormat
items.desc: An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.

items.name: static var RG16: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only red and green color components.

items.name: static var RG8: CIFormat
items.desc: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only red and green color components.

items.name: static var RGBA16: CIFormat
items.desc: A 64-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format.

items.name: static var RGBA8: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the red, green, and blue color components precede the alpha value.

items.name: static var RGBAf: CIFormat
items.desc: A 128-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format.

items.name: static var RGBAh: CIFormat
items.desc: A 64-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format.

items.name: static var RGf: CIFormat
items.desc: A 64-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format with only red and green color components.

items.name: static var RGh: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format with only red and green color components.

items.name: static var Rf: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.

items.name: static var Rh: CIFormat
items.desc: A 16-bit-per-pixel, floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is a red color value.

items.name: static var L16: CIFormat
items.desc: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is luminance.

items.name: static var L8: CIFormat
items.desc: An 8-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format in which the sole component is luminance.

items.name: static var LA16: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only 16-bit luminance and alpha components.

items.name: static var LA8: CIFormat
items.desc: A 16-bit-per-pixel, fixed-point pixel format with only 8-bit luminance and alpha components.

items.name: static var LAf: CIFormat
items.desc: A 64-bit-per-pixel, full-width floating-point pixel format with 32-bit luminance and alpha components.

items.name: static var LAh: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, half-width floating-point pixel format with 16-bit luminance and alpha components.

items.name: static var Lf: CIFormat
items.desc: A 32-bit-per-pixel, full-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is luminance.

items.name: static var Lh: CIFormat
items.desc: A 16-bit-per-pixel, half-width floating-point pixel format in which the sole component is luminance.
